title: John Remington at Eighty
credit_line: Bequest of Edgar W. and Bernice Chrysler Garbisch
provenance_text:
Unidentified party, New York [1]; Rockwell Gardiner, Stamford, CT?, by 1954 [2]. Edgar W. and Bernice Chrysler Garbisch, Cambridge, MD, 1954 [3]; bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 2, 1981. 
NOTES:1. Records indicate this first provenance only as "Found in New York state."  2. This has been recorded elsewhere as "Stanford, CT".  3. This work was on loan to the National Gallery of Art, Washington, D.C from 1955 until 1980.
